headline: Ask HN: What are your favourite Joe Rogan Podcast episodes?
description:
I just stumbled upon this episode with Maajid Nawaz[1] and was really "blown away" by the depth of the conversation. Now instead of going through episode by episode by myself, I wonder if someone here has a Top 10 list of episodes to recommend?

[1]https://open.spotify.com/episode/1ugbn7cuab3mNgKbo81ajM?si=73bc0bca2f3b4557
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你最喜欢的乔-罗根播客的哪几集？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你最喜歡的喬-羅根播客的哪幾集？
description_zh-Hans:
我刚刚偶然发现了与马吉德-纳瓦兹的这一集[1]，真的被谈话的深度所"震撼"。现在，与其自己一集一集地看，我想知道这里是否有人有一个可以推荐的十佳剧集清单？

[1]https://open.spotify.com/episode/1ugbn7cuab3mNgKbo81ajM?si=73bc0bca2f3b4557
description_zh-Hant:
我剛剛偶然發現了與馬吉德-納瓦茲的這一集[1]，真的被談話的深度所"震撼"。現在，與其自己一集一集地看，我想知道這裡是否有人有一個可以推薦的十佳劇集清單？

[1]https://open.spotify.com/episode/1ugbn7cuab3mNgKbo81ajM?si=73bc0bca2f3b4557
